name: Pubby & Lonny Reunited Eventure
description:
Shaw, as a new World Leader, brings the rest of The Nays with him to visit their home in Compass World. After holding a party for their return and Shaw's new position, The Nays decide to return back to The Worlds. 

Once Adrian hears of Pubby's disappearance, he is determined to put his detective skills to the test and find his friend with the help of Firebreath.

You can view this Eventure on the interactive website here!
